channel.title: 508 Interface
channel.description:
Hello, On my server, I am permitted to have an interface on screen, overlay, or etc.
But if I had an Overlay on screen, and right click someone, something, or even an NPC, it would imediatley disappear because of the current Overlay I had.
Do any of you know how to allow more than 1 overlay appear, without none disappearing?

item.title: 508 Interface
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

without none disappearing? You want them to disappear?

Read full topic
